content.name: RecycleShipsAndStations
content.description: Player can disassemble his ships, recycle stations or sell stations to other factions.
content.author: iforgotmysocks

text.name: Recycle Ships And Stations
text.description: Добавляет возможность разбирать свои корабли, перерабатывать станции или продавать их другим фракциям.
text.author: iforgotmysocks
